name: Supply of provisions and reinforcements
description: At the commencement of the twenty-ninth year, Helaman received a supply of provisions and an addition of six thousand men to his army from the land of Zarahemla, along with sixty of the sons of the Ammonites who came to join the two thousand soldiers.

location.name: Land of Zarahemla
location.description: from the land of Zarahemla, and from the land round about
